en.title: Do you require your Divorce documents in English and Welsh (emails, letters, texts, certificates)?

cya.agree: Do you require your Divorce documents in English and Welsh (emails, letters, texts, certificates)?
cya.reason: Why don’t you agree that the court has jurisdiction?
cya.country: In which country is your life mainly based?

en.summary: If you don’t need your document to be translated to Welsh language, please choose No.
en.question: Just one of these gives the court jurisdiction.
en.answerNo: All documnets will be in English.

disagree.heading: No
disagree.reason: Why don’t you agree that the court has jurisdiction?
disagree.country: In which country is your life mainly based?

errors.required: Select yes if you need your documents to be translated to Welsh.

cy.title: A ydy’ch priodas wedi chwalu’n anadferadwy (ni ellir ei hachub)?

cya.agree: A ydy’ch priodas wedi chwalu’n anadferadwy (ni ellir ei hachub)?
cya.reason: Pam nad ydych yn cytuno fod gan y llys awdurdodaeth?
cya.country: Ym mha wlad ydych chi’n byw gan mwyaf?

cy.summary: Os nad ydych eisiau i’ch dogfennau gael eu cyfieithu i’r Gymraeg, dewiswch ‘Na’.
cy.question: Dim ond un o’r rhain sy’n rhoi awdurdodaeth i’r llys.

disagree.heading: Na
disagree.reason: Pam nad ydych yn cytuno fod gan y llys awdurdodaeth?
disagree.country: Ym mha wlad ydych chi’n byw gan mwyaf?

errors.required: Dewiswch do os yw eich priodas wedi chwalu’n anadferadwy
